newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Sterling Software a buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Sterling Software a buy.

text.p: -- Alex. Brown said it reinitiated coverage of Sterling Software Inc with a buy rating.
-- Shares rose 1/8 to 33-1/8 in early NYSE trade.

-- Analyst Chris Mortenson said the company is expected to report earnings for the final quarter of the 1996 fiscal year next week, and he is forecasting $0.54 per share for the quarter, up from $0.49 one year ago.
-- For FY 1996, he is expecting earnings of $1.71 per share.
-- FY 1997 forecast is $1.80 per share and FY 1998 is $2.09 per share, the analyst said.
-- 12-month share price target is $40 per share.
